Articles.Content: To start with in the DSM pack is a cargo strut how do i use this and other parts like this? Also because i have brought the full vesion does that mean that 0.17 onwards are free for me? I have the C7 Avation Pack and when i go to place a tilt-roter it asks about sevo configuration what does thi mean?

1) I dont believe that this is active yet, just a placeholder part (Like some of the docking ports in other mods) but I do not know.

2) Yes

3) Servo's are the motors that are used to tilt the object it just wants to know if you want them grouped, what keys to assign, starting postion etc.
